name: Paper Planes Flight Sim
description:
Casual free flight with automatic multiplayer. Discover a breathtaking world of color and funky shapes. 5 special paper aircraft are hidden throughout the level to spice things up. Enjoy exploring with up to 10 players with automatic online play.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the on screen joystick, or tilt controls(available in settings), to control the aircraft. You can reset your airplane with the pause button.

FEATURES:

*Realistic flight simulator for mobile!

*An amazing paper world to explore

*6 paper airplanes to fly

*10 player automatic online play

*100% free with no in game purchases.

FOLLOW US:
